text: The 2015 South Carolina Gamecocks baseball team represents the University of South Carolina in the 2015 NCAA Division I baseball season. The Gamecocks play their home games in Carolina Stadium. The team is coached by Chad Holbrook, who is in his third season as head coach at Carolina. ==Personnel== ===Roster=== {| class="toccolours" style="border-collapse:collapse; font- size:90%;" |- | colspan="7" style=background:#73000A;color:white;
